label: Table Bois (Catalogue)
description: Jeu pose sur une table en bois clair, lumiere naturelle.

environment.setting: Light wood table surface (oak or birch)
environment.background: Neutral warm background, slightly out of focus
environment.surface: Clean wood grain visible, no clutter

composition.camera_angle: Top-down or slightly angled (15-25 degrees from above)
composition.framing: Product centered with generous negative space around edges
composition.depth_of_field: Moderate, entire product sharp, background softly blurred

lighting_override.direction: Soft natural side light from a window
lighting_override.shadows: Gentle shadows to the right of the product

mood: Premium catalog photography, calm, educational, trustworthy

label: En Situation
description: Mains d'enfants ou d'adultes jouant avec le jeu.

environment.setting: Play area or table where the game is being actively used
environment.background: Soft, blurred domestic or classroom interior
environment.surface: Varies naturally: wooden table, play mat, or soft rug
environment.props: Hands interacting — adapt to game type: stacking, sorting, matching, building, reading

composition.camera_angle: Close-up, slightly elevated (30 degrees), focused on hands and product
composition.framing: Tight crop showing interaction, product fills 60-70% of frame
composition.depth_of_field: Shallow, sharp focus on hands and product, background blurred

lighting_override.direction: Natural ambient light, warm indoor lighting

mood: Authentic play session, candid feel, joyful learning moment
variation_notes: Interaction style adapts to the game type. Surface and background details vary naturally.

environment.setting: Modern European classroom with school furniture
environment.background: Blurred: whiteboard, shelves, other desks, educational posters
environment.surface: School desk (light wood or white laminate)
environment.props: Pencils, notebooks subtly visible near product, not competing

composition.framing: Product on desk with classroom context visible behind
composition.depth_of_field: Shallow, product crisp, classroom background soft bokeh

lighting_override.direction: Natural daylight from large windows mixed with soft overhead light

label: Coin Lecture

environment.setting: Cozy reading corner with soft furnishings
environment.surface: Soft rug, fabric play mat, or beside cushions
environment.props: Cushions, children's books, plush toy partially visible

composition.camera_angle: Low angle (ground level or near), intimate perspective
composition.framing: Product nestled in cozy setting, warm framing

lighting_override.direction: Warm golden hour light from side window

mood: Warmth, comfort, safe learning environment, hygge feeling
variation_notes: Cushion colors, book spines, and fabric textures can vary slightly.

label: Mise en Scene Creative
description: Decor adapte au theme du jeu.

environment.setting: Styled flat-lay or arranged scene adapted to the game's educational theme
environment.background: Clean surface: linen, light wood, or textured paper — chosen to complement the product's palette
environment.surface: Flat surface appropriate for overhead or angled composition
environment.props: 3-5 small props directly related to the game's educational subject (e.g., wooden numbers for counting, colored pencils for drawing, figurines for storytelling, letter blocks for literacy). NO generic nature elements unless the game is specifically about nature.

composition.framing: Balanced arrangement, product as hero with supporting props
composition.depth_of_field: Sharp throughout for flat-lay, selective for angled shots

lighting_override.direction: Even, diffused overhead light or large softbox from above

mood: Creative, editorial, Instagram-worthy, educational and credible
variation_notes: Props must be chosen based on the product analysis (name, theme, features, colors). NEVER default to nature elements. Each generation should feel unique and directly connected to the game's subject.

label: Hero Shot (Social)
description: Fond propre, esthetique pour reseaux sociaux.

environment.background: Seamless solid Sola Didact brand tone: soft white (#f5f5f0), muted green (sage/olive wash from #5dac3e), or dark charcoal (#3a383e) — chosen to best contrast with the product
environment.surface: Clean, flat surface matching background tone

composition.framing: Product centered, high aesthetic value, perfect for social media

lighting_override.direction: Soft key light from upper left, gentle fill from right
lighting_override.shadows: Clean, defined but soft shadow beneath product

mood: High aesthetic, minimalist, social media ready, premium brand feel

label: Exterieur / Nature

environment.background: Green foliage, wildflowers, dappled sunlight, distant meadow or garden
environment.surface: Varies: weathered garden table, stone bench, blanket on grass, tree stump
environment.props: Natural elements only — leaves, flowers, grass, bark

composition.framing: Product in natural context with visible greenery
composition.depth_of_field: Moderate, product sharp, nature background softly present

lighting_override.direction: Bright, soft natural daylight, possibly dappled through leaves

mood: Fresh air, nature, outdoor connection, authentic and not staged
variation_notes: The outdoor surface and surrounding nature elements vary each time. Can be garden, terrace, meadow, forest edge.
